sense.gloss: homo, homosexual (esp. a male), homosexuality (esp. male-male)
Homo (genus of primates incl. modern humans)

sdata.j: ここだけの↑話↑↓はなし↓だが、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|ホモ|らしい。
sdata.e: Between ourselves, he seems to be a homosexual.

sdata.j: それと↑俺↑↓おれ↓が|ホモ|だとしたら、↑罪↑↓つみ↓になるわけ？
sdata.e: And if I were gay, would that be a crime?

sdata.j: この↑間↑↓かん↓、↑面↑↓めん↓と↑向↑↓む↓かって|ホモ|って↑言↑↓い↓われる↑夢見↑↓ゆめみ↓た。
sdata.e: Recently, I dreamt that "Homo!" was said to my face.
